title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts Rocket Launches from Lebanon: No Casualties Reported”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following the alerts that were activated in the Golan Heights area at 15:35, about 30 launches were identified crossing from Lebanon. Several launches were intercepted by air defense fighters, while the rest fell in open areas. Firefighting forces are currently working to extinguish several fires that broke out in the area as a result of the launches. There are no casualties.

Following the alerts that were activated in the Western Galilee area at 15:56, about ten launches were identified crossing from Lebanon. There are no casualties.

Following the alerts that were activated in the Upper Galilee area at 15:58, about five launches were identified crossing from Lebanon, most of which were intercepted by air defense fighters. There are no casualties.
